original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Meṇḍakapañha
analyzed: meṇḍakapañha

original: Sabbaññutañāṇavagga
analyzed: sabbaññuta ñāṇa vagga

original: 5. Attanipātanapañha
analyzed: atta nipātana pañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṁ bhagavatā—
analyzed: bhante nāgasena bhāsitam petam bhagavatā

original: ‘na, bhikkhave, attānaṁ pātetabbaṁ, yo pāteyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti.
analyzed: na bhikkhave attānam pātetabba yaḥ pāteyya yathādhammaḥ kāretabbaḥ ti

original: Puna ca tumhe bhaṇatha—
analyzed: puna ca tumhe bhaṇatha

original: ‘yattha katthaci bhagavā sāvakānaṁ dhammaṁ desayamāno anekapariyāyena jātiyā jarāya
analyzed: yattha katthaci bhagavā sāvakānam dhammam desayamānaḥ aneka pariyāyena jātiyāḥ jarāya

original: byādhino maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammaṁ deseti, yo hi koci jātijarābyādhimaraṇaṁ
analyzed: byādhinaḥ maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammam deseti yaḥ hi koci jāti jarā byādhi maraṇa

original: samatikkamati, taṁ paramāya pasaṁsāya pasaṁsatī’ti.
analyzed: samatikkamati tam paramāya pasasāya pasasati iti

original: Yadi, bhante nāgasena, bhagavatā bhaṇitaṁ—
analyzed: yadi bhante nāgasena bhagavatā bhaṇita

original: ‘na, bhikkhave, attānaṁ pātetabbaṁ, yo pāteyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti, tena hi ‘jātiyā jarāya byādhino maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammaṁ desetī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
analyzed: na bhikkhave attānam pātetabba yaḥ pāteyya yathādhammo kāretabbo ti tena hi jātiyāḥ jarāya byādhino maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammam deseti iti yam tam micchā

original: Yadi jātiyā jarāya byādhino maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammaṁ deseti, tena hi ‘na, bhikkhave, attānaṁ pātetabbaṁ, yo pāteyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
analyzed: yadi jātiyāḥ jarāya byādhinaḥ maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammam deseti tena hi na bhikkhave attānam pātetabba yaḥ pāteyya yathādhammo kāretabbaḥ iti tat pi vacanam micchā

original: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
analyzed: ayam pi ubhatas koṭikaḥ pañho tava anuppatto saḥ tayā nibbāhitabbaḥ ti

original: “Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā

original: ‘na, bhikkhave, attānaṁ pātetabbaṁ, yo pāteyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti.
analyzed: na bhikkhave attānam pātetabba yaḥ pāteyya yathādhammaḥ kāretabbaḥ ti

original: Yattha katthaci bhagavatā sāvakānaṁ dhammaṁ desayamānena ca anekapariyāyena jātiyā
analyzed: yattha katthaci bhagavatā sāvakānam dhammam desayamānena ca aneka pariyāyena jātiyā

original: jarāya byādhino maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammo desito, tattha pana kāraṇaṁ atthi,
analyzed: jarāya byādhinaḥ maraṇassa samucchedāya dhammo desito tattha pana kāraṇam atthi

original: yena bhagavā kāraṇena paṭikkhipi samādapesi cā”ti.
analyzed: yena bhagavā kāraṇena paṭikkhipi samādapesi ca ati

original: “Kiṁ panettha, bhante nāgasena, kāraṇaṁ, yena bhagavā kāraṇena paṭikkhipi samādapesi cā”ti?
analyzed: kim pana ittha bhante nāgasena kāraṇa yena bhagavā kāraṇena paṭikkhipi samādapesi ca ati

original: “Sīlavā, mahārāja, sīlasampanno agadasamo sattānaṁ kilesavisavināsane, osadhasamo
analyzed: sīlavā mahā rāja sīla sampannaḥ agada samaḥ sattānam kilesa visa vināsane osadha samaḥ

original: sattānaṁ kilesabyādhivūpasame, udakasamo sattānaṁ kilesarajojallāpaharaṇe, maṇiratanasamo
analyzed: sattānam kilesa byādhi vūpa same udaka samaḥ sattānam kilesa rajaḥ jalla apaharaṇe maṇi ratana samaḥ

original: sattānaṁ sabbasampattidāne, nāvāsamo sattānaṁ caturoghapāragamane, satthavāhasamo
analyzed: sattānam sabba sampatti dāne nāvā asamaḥ sattānam catur ogha pāra gamane satthavāha samaḥ

original: sattānaṁ jātikantāratāraṇe, vātasamo sattānaṁ tividhaggisantāpanibbāpane, mahāmeghasamo
analyzed: sattānam jāti kantāra tāraṇe vāta samaḥ sattānam tividha aggi santāpa nibbāpane mahā megha samaḥ

original: sattānaṁ mānasaparipūraṇe, ācariyasamo sattānaṁ kusalasikkhāpane, sudesakasamo sattānaṁ
analyzed: sattānam mānasa paripūraṇe ācariya samaḥ sattānam kusala sikkhāpane sudesaka samaḥ

original: khemapathamācikkhaṇe.
analyzed: khema patha mācikkhaṇe

original: Evarūpo, mahārāja, bahuguṇo anekaguṇo appamāṇaguṇo guṇarāsi guṇapuñjo sattānaṁ vaḍḍhikaro
analyzed: evarūpaḥ mahā rāja bahu guṇaḥ aneka guṇaḥ appamāṇa guṇaḥ guṇa rāsi guṇa puñjaḥ sattānam vaḍḍhi karo

original: sīlavā ‘mā vinassī’ti sattānaṁ anukampāya bhagavā sikkhāpadaṁ paññapesi ‘na, bhikkhave,
analyzed: sīlavā mā vinassi iti sattānam anukampāya bhagavā sikkhāpadam paññapesi na bhikkhave

original: attānaṁ pātetabbaṁ, yo pāteyya, yathādhammo kāretabbo’ti.
analyzed: attānam pātetabba yaḥ pāteyya yathādhammaḥ kāretabbaḥ iti

original: Idamettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yena kāraṇena bhagavā paṭikkhipi.
analyzed: idam ettha mahā rāja kāraṇa yena kāraṇena bhagavā paṭikkhipi

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, therena kumārakassapena vicitrakathikena pāyāsirājaññassa
analyzed: mahā rāja therena kumārakassapena vicitrakathikena pāyāsi rājaññassa

original: paralokaṁ dīpayamānena ‘yathā yathā kho, rājañña, samaṇabrāhmaṇā sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā
analyzed: para lokam dīpayamānena yathā yathā kho rājañña samaṇa brāhmaṇā sīlavantaḥ kalyāṇa dhammā

original: ciraṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ tiṭṭhanti tathā tathā bahuṁ puññaṁ pasavanti, bahujanahitāya
analyzed: ciram dīgham addhānam tiṭṭhanti tathā tathā bahum puññam pasavanti bahu jana hitāya

original: ca paṭipajjanti bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānan’ti.
analyzed: ca paṭipajjanti bahu jana sukhāya loka anukampāya atthāya hitāya sukhāya deva manussānam ti

original: Kena pana kāraṇena bhagavā samādapesi?
analyzed: kena pana kāraṇena bhagavā samādapesi

original: Jātipi, mahārāja, dukkhā, jarāpi dukkhā, byādhipi dukkho, maraṇampi dukkhaṁ, sokopi
analyzed: jāti pi mahā rāja dukkhā jarā api dukkhā byādhi pi dukkhaḥ maraṇam pi dukkha sokaḥ api

original: dukkho, paridevopi dukkho, dukkhampi dukkhaṁ, domanassampi dukkhaṁ, upāyāsopi dukkho,
analyzed: dukkhaḥ paridevaḥ api dukkhaḥ dukkham pi dukkha domanassam api dukkhaḥ upāyāsaḥ api dukkhaḥ

original: appiyehi sampayogopi dukkho, piyehi vippayogopi dukkho, mātumaraṇampi dukkhaṁ, pitumaraṇampi
analyzed: appiyehi sampayogaḥ api dukkhaḥ piyehi vippayogaḥ api dukkhaḥ mātu maraṇam pi dukkha pitu maraṇam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, bhātumaraṇampi dukkhaṁ, bhaginimaraṇampi dukkhaṁ, puttamaraṇampi dukkhaṁ,
analyzed: dukkha bhātu maraṇam pi dukkha bhagini maraṇam pi dukkha putta maraṇam pi

original: dāramaraṇampi dukkhaṁ, dāsamaraṇampi dukkhaṁ, ñātimaraṇampi dukkhaṁ, ñātibyasanampi
analyzed: dāra maraṇam pi dukkha dāsa maraṇam pi dukkha ñāti maraṇam pi dukkha ñāti byasanam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, rogabyasanampi dukkhaṁ, bhogabyasanampi dukkhaṁ, sīlabyasanampi dukkhaṁ,
analyzed: dukkha roga byasanam pi dukkha bhoga byasanam pi dukkha sīla byasanam pi dukkha

original: diṭṭhibyasanampi dukkhaṁ, rājabhayampi dukkhaṁ, corabhayampi dukkhaṁ, veribhayampi
analyzed: diṭṭhi byasanam pi dukkha rāja bhayam pi dukkha cora bhayam pi dukkha veri bhayam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, dubbhikkhabhayampi dukkhaṁ, aggibhayampi dukkhaṁ, udakabhayampi dukkhaṁ,
analyzed: dukkha dubbhikkha bhayam pi dukkha aggi bhayam pi dukkha udaka bhayam pi dukkha

original: ūmibhayampi dukkhaṁ, āvaṭṭabhayampi dukkhaṁ, kumbhīlabhayampi dukkhaṁ, susukābhayampi
analyzed: ūmi bhayam pi dukkha āvaṭṭa bhayam pi dukkha kumbhīla bhayam pi dukkha susukā bhayam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, attānuvādabhayampi dukkhaṁ, parānuvādabhayampi dukkhaṁ, daṇḍabhayampi dukkhaṁ,
analyzed: dukkha atta anuvāda bhayam pi dukkha para anuvāda bhayam pi dukkha daṇḍa bhayam pi dukkha

original: duggatibhayampi dukkhaṁ, parisāsārajjabhayampi dukkhaṁ, ājīvakabhayampi dukkhaṁ,
analyzed: duggati bhayam pi dukkha parisāsārajja bhayam pi dukkha ājīvaka bhayam pi dukkha

original: maraṇabhayampi dukkhaṁ, vettehi tāḷanampi dukkhaṁ, kasāhi tāḷanampi dukkhaṁ, addhadaṇḍakehi
analyzed: maraṇa bhayam pi dukkha vettehi tāḷanam pi dukkha kasāhi tāḷanam pi dukkha addhadaṇḍakehi

original: tāḷanampi dukkhaṁ, hatthacchedanampi dukkhaṁ, pādacchedanampi dukkhaṁ, hatthapādacchedanampi
analyzed: tāḷanam pi dukkha hattha chedanam pi dukkha pāda chedanam pi dukkha hattha pāda chedanam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, kaṇṇacchedanampi dukkhaṁ, nāsacchedanampi dukkhaṁ, kaṇṇanāsacchedanampi
analyzed: dukkha kaṇṇa chedanam pi dukkha nāsa chedanam pi dukkha kaṇṇa nāsa chedanam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, bilaṅgathālikampi dukkhaṁ, saṅkhamuṇḍikampi dukkhaṁ, rāhumukhampi dukkhaṁ,
analyzed: dukkha bilaṅga thālikam pi dukkha saṅkhamuṇḍikam pi dukkha rāhumukham pi

original: jotimālikampi dukkhaṁ, hatthapajjotikampi dukkhaṁ, erakavattikampi dukkhaṁ, cīrakavāsikampi
analyzed: jotimālikampi dukkha hatthapajjotikampi dukkha erakavattikampi dukkha cīrakavāsikampi

original: dukkhaṁ, eṇeyyakampi dukkhaṁ, baḷisamaṁsikampi dukkhaṁ, kahāpaṇikampi dukkhaṁ, khārāpatacchikampi
analyzed: dukkha eṇeyyakam pi dukkha baḷisamasikam pi dukkha kahāpaṇikam pi dukkha khārāpatacchikam pi

original: dukkhaṁ, palighaparivattikampi dukkhaṁ, palālapīṭhakampi dukkhaṁ, tattena telena
analyzed: paligha parivattikam pi dukkha palāla pīṭhakam pi dukkha tattena telena

original: osiñcanampi dukkhaṁ, sunakhehi khādāpanampi dukkhaṁ, jīvasūlāropanampi dukkhaṁ, asinā
analyzed: osiñcanam pi dukkha su nakhehi khādāpanam pi dukkha jīva sūla āropanam pi dukkha asinā

original: sīsacchedanampi dukkhaṁ, evarūpāni, mahārāja, bahuvidhāni anekavidhāni dukkhāni saṁsāragato anubhavati.
analyzed: sīsa chedanam pi dukkhe evarūpāni mahā rāja bahuvidhāni anekavidhāni dukkhāni sa sāra gataḥ anubhavati

original: Yathā, mahārāja, himavantapabbate abhivuṭṭhaṁ udakaṁ gaṅgāya nadiyā pāsāṇasakkharakharamarumbaāvaṭṭagaggalakaūmikavaṅkacadika-āvaraṇanīvaraṇamūlakasākhāsu pariyottharati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja himavanta pabbate abhivuṭṭham udakam gaṅgāya nadiyā pāsāṇa sakkhara khara marumba āvaṭṭa gaggala kaūmika vaṅka cadika āvaraṇa nīvaraṇa mūlaka sākhāsu pariyottharati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, evarūpāni bahuvidhāni anekavidhāni dukkhāni saṁsāragato anubhavati.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja evarūpāni bahuvidhāni anekavidhāni dukkhāni sa sāra gataḥ anubhavati

original: Pavattaṁ, mahārāja, dukkhaṁ, appavattaṁ sukhaṁ.
analyzed: pavatta mahā rāja dukkha appavattam sukha

original: Appavattassa guṇaṁ pavatte ca bhayaṁ dīpayamāno, mahārāja, bhagavā appavattassa sacchikiriyāya
analyzed: appavattassa guṇam pavatte ca bhayam dīpayamānaḥ mahā rāja bhagavā appavattassa sacchikiriyāya

original: jātijarābyādhimaraṇasamatikkamāya samādapesi, idamettha, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ, yena
analyzed: jāti jarā byādhi maraṇa samatikkamāya samādapesi idam ettha mahā rāja kāraṇa yena

original: kāraṇena bhagavā samādapesī”ti.
analyzed: kāraṇena bhagavā samādapesi iti

original: “Sādhu, bhante nāgasena, sunibbeṭhito pañho, sukathitaṁ kāraṇaṁ, evametaṁ tathā sampaṭicchāmī”ti.
analyzed: sādhu bhante nāgasena su nibbeṭhitaḥ pañhaḥ su kathitam kāraṇe evam etam tathā sampaṭicchāmi iti

original: Attanipātanapañho pañcamo.
analyzed: attanipātanapañho pañcamo
